testcase.name: Sending a message with an order
testcase.system-out: Given Romeo who wants to buy a drink........................................passed When an order is declared for Juliette......................................passed And a message saying "Wanna chat?" is added.................................passed Then the ticket must say "From Romeo to Juliette: Wanna chat?"..............passed

testcase.name: Sending a message with an order 2
testcase.system-out: Given Romeo who wants to buy a drink........................................passed When an order is declared for Jerry.........................................passed And a message saying "Hei!" is added........................................passed Then the ticket must say "From Romeo to Jerry: Hei!"........................passed
